channel.title: Classpath and PATH?
channel.description:
I am sorry if this is already stated somewhere, but I have been looking and cannot find it. I used to have it but somehow it got deleted and wasnt working correctly. Anywho.
I downloaded the JDK and JRE or whatever and I Need to know what code to put in the two paths (PATH, classpath?) in the enviromental variables section.
Thank you very much, I am anxious to use Mopars Aryan Updater (heard it was very good) and bAsh's free Slave Bot. Thanks again!
EDIT*: I have found these, but can anyone double check them?
variable name: Classpath. Variable value: SET CLASSPATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_06\bin;%CLASSPATH%;. Now click "ok".
and...
Variabl Name: Path. Variable value: C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_06\bin;C:\Program Files\Java\jre1.5.0_06\bin. Now click "Ok".

item.title: Classpath and PATH?
item.dc:creator: @jag024 jag024
item.description:
@jag024 wrote:

I am sorry if this is already stated somewhere, but I have been looking and cannot find it. I used to have it but somehow it got deleted and wasnt working correctly. Anywho.

I downloaded the JDK and JRE or whatever and I Need to know what code to put in the two paths (PATH, classpath?) in the enviromental variables section.

Thank you very much, I am anxious to use Mopars Aryan Updater (heard it was very good) and bAsh’s free Slave Bot. Thanks again!

EDIT*: I have found these, but can anyone double check them?

variable name: Classpath.
Variable value: SET CLASSPATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_06\bin;%CLASSPATH%;.
Now click “ok”.

and…

Variabl Name: Path.
Variable value: C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_06\bin;C:\Program Files\Java\jre1.5.0_06\bin.
Now click “Ok”.
